title: Will Uber Copter rides really save time?
text: Ride-hailing app company Uber is offering New York City passengers helicopter trips to the airport. RT America’s Trinity Chavez has the details. Turkey is reportedly preparing to launch a military offensive along the Syria-Iraq border to remove Kurdish forces from the area and establish a “safe zone” to re-settle millions of Syrian refugees. RT America’s Sayeh Tavangar reports. Plus, the European Union's aviation regulator is worried changes made to the Boeing 737 Max 8 jet's new software aren't enough while a former Ethiopian Airlines engineer claims Boeing has a pattern of corruption, including fabricating documents. Former National Transportation Safety Board official Jamie Finch shares his insights.
description: Ride-hailing app company Uber is offering New York City passengers helicopter trips to the airport
